duties_responsibilities.duty: Write high-performance code and manage our codebase
Recruit, hire, and manage engineering talent
Own the strategy and execution of all technical goals, deliverables, and projects
Define and drive our technical roadmap
Manage an efficient, high-quality output of engineering and technical teams including but not limited to sprint management, scoping, effort estimation, QA, and people management
Manage executional risk through thorough resource planning and allocation
Foster an engaging, communicative, and collaborative engineering culture
Translate business goals and requirements into technical tasks and projects
Communicate as the technical leader of the company
Maintain an external presence that increases the visibility of the company’s engineering organization
